traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The talon beast has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sense Magic
entries: The talon beast can detect and pinpoint the location of magic within 120 feet of itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The talon beast makes two Talon attacks or a Talon attack and a Beak attack.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage, and if the target has any spell effects on itself or any magic items in its possession, the target must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a random spell effect on the target ends. If the target has no spell effects on it, one random magic item in its possession has its magical properties suppressed for 1 minute. If the item is a potion or scroll, it becomes nonmagical instead.

actions.name: Talon
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6 damage) slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition, and the talon beast can't use Talon on another target.
